ops.description: PredicateRegistryOps v1 ops array (objects with op = 'predicate.add' | 'predicate.alias_add' | 'predicate.deprecate').

predicate_spec_path.description: Optional predicate spec registry path (absolute or relative to current working directory). Default: registries/predicate_spec_v1.json

predicate_alias_path.description: Optional predicate alias registry path (absolute or relative to current working directory). Default: registries/predicate_alias_v1.json
